71b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes
71b8('bum): pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes
72a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
72a2('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i rnam par shes myed do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par
72a3('bum): shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i
72a4('bum): rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar
72a5('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
72a6('bum): gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /gal te lce'i rnam
72a7('bum): par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
72a8('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar
72b1('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
72b2('bum): gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam/ bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /gal te lus kyi
72b3('bum): rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
72b4('bum): spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces
72b5('bum): bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
72b6('bum): pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi rnam par
72b7('bum): shes pa myed do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
72b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam
73a1('bum): par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug
73a2('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug
73a3('bum): pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te
73a4('bum): reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
73a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa
73a6('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam
73a7('bum): bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i
73a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na
73b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i
73b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug
73b3('bum): bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
73b4('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/
73b5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
73b6('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa
73b7('bum): 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes
73b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes
74a1('bum): bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na
74a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
74a3('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus
74a4('bum): te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
74a5('bum): gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed
74a6('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
74a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /
74a8('bum): gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
74b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba
74b2('bum): 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
74b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /gal te myig
74b4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
74b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
74b6('bum): te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
74b7('bum): ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag
74b8('bum): myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
75a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus
75a2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces
75a3('bum): bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na
75a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par
75a5('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i
75a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba
75a7('bum): 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
75a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
75b1('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do/ /gal
75b2('bum): te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi
75b3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
75b4('bum): do/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
75b5('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal
75b6('bum): ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
75b7('bum): tshor ba la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
75b8('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te
76a1('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
76a2('bum): ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am
76a3('bum): bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la
76a4('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
76a5('bum): gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
76a6('bum): tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces
76a7('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug
76a8('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do/ /gal te sa'i khams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba
76b1('bum): 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
76b2('bum): gal te sa'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na
76b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par
76b4('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sa'i khams myed do/ /gal te chu'i khams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
76b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/
76b6('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
76b7('bum): na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chu'i khams myed do/ /gal te mye'i khams la
76b8('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mye'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mye'i khams bde zhes bya ba
77a1('bum): 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mye'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
77a2('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te me'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde
77a3('bum): ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mye'i khams myed do/ /gal te rlung gi khams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
77a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
77a5('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi
77a6('bum): khams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam
77a7('bum): bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rlung gi khams myed do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i
77a8('bum): khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
77b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams
77b2('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
77b3('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nam mkha'i khams myed do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
77b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
77b5('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
77b6('bum): gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug
77b7('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/
77b8('bum): gal te ma rig pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa bde zhes
78a1('bum): bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
78a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am
78a3('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ma rig pa myed do/ /gal te 'du byed la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
78a4('bum): gal te 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
78a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi
78a6('bum): sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am
78a7('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed myed do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi
78a8('bum): rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
78b1('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/
78b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par
78b3('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar
78b4('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs
78b5('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
78b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba
78b7('bum): de lta bu'i mying dang gzugs myed do/ /gal te skye mched drug la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na
78b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug bdag
79a1('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
79a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa ma myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par
79a3('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye mched drug myed do/ /gal te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
79a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa bdag ces bya ba
79a5('bum): 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
79a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i reg pa myed do/ /gal te
79a7('bum): tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba
79a8('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
79b1('bum): phyin pa spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde
79b2('bum): ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba myed do/ /gal te sred pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
79b3('bum): spyod do/ /gal te sred pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na
79b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa sdug ces bya ba
79b5('bum): 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed
79b6('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sred pa myed do/ /gal te len pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces
79b7('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa
79b8('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
80a1('bum): pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur
80a2('bum): ba de lta bu'i len pa myed do/ /gal te srid pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ /shes rab kyi
80a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag
80a4('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir
80a5('bum): zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i srid pa myed do/ /gal te skye ba la
80a6('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba bde zhes bya
80a7('bum): ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
80a8('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/
80b1('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye ba myed do/ /gal te rga shi la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi
80b2('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
80b3('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
80b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba
80b5('bum): de lta bu'i rga shi myed do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi
80b6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
80b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces
80b8('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am
81a1('bum): myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul
81a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
81a3('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
81a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
81a5('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /
81a6('bum): gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
81a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i
81a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya
81b1('bum): bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug
81b2('bum): pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson
81b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
81b4('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
81b5('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/
81b6('bum): myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te bsam
81b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
81b8('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
82a1('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya
82a2('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am
82a3('bum): myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha
82a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
82a5('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
82a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/
82a7('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
82a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
82b1('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang
82b2('bum): stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag
82b3('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa
82b4('bum): nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
82b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/
82b6('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed
82b7('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyi stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag
82b8('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
83a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid
83a2('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
83a3('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa
83a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/
83a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong
83a6('bum): pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag
83a7('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te chen po stong pa nyid la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chen
83a8('bum): po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
83b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chen po stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am
83b2('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/
83b3('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chen po stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag
83b4('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
83b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug
83b6('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag
83b7('bum): med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus byas
83b8('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na
84a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
84a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug
84a3('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
84a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde
84a5('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
84a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
84a7('bum): pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te mtha' las
84a8('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
84b1('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mtha' las 'das pa
84b2('bum): stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya
84b3('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa
84b4('bum): 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thog
84b5('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/
84b6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
84b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
84b8('bum): pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te
85a1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
85a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba myed
85a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba myed pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces
85a4('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug
85a5('bum): pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces
85a6('bum): bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
85a7('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/
85a8('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/
85b1('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams
85b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes
85b3('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
85b4('bum): do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am
85b5('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi
85b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes
85b7('bum): bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
85b8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag
86a1('bum): pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te myi dmyigs
86a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
86a3('bum): do/ /gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am
86a4('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
86a5('bum): pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myi dmyigs
86a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces
86a7('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
86a8('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
86b1('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/
86b2('bum): bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
86b3('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba
86b4('bum): 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
86b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa
86b6('bum): 'am bde bam sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
86b7('bum): la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
86b8('bum): spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
87a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba
87a2('bum): 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag
87a3('bum): myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
87a4('bum): spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes
87a5('bum): bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na
87a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i
87a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
87a8('bum): myed do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na
87b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
87b2('bum): gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am
87b3('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed
87b4('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yang dag par spong ba myed do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu
87b5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
87b6('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
87b7('bum): spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa
87b8('bum): 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed do/ /gal te dbang po rnams la myi spyod na/
88a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang
88a2('bum): po rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod
88a3('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
88a4('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang po rnams myed do/ /gal te stobs rnams la
88a5('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams bde
88a6('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
88a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/
88a8('bum): bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i stobs rnams myed do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi
88b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan
88b2('bum): lag rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya
88b3('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i
88b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
88b5('bum): myed do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces
88b6('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
88b7('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam
88b8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci 'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal
89a1('bum): ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi
89a2('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
89a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag
89a4('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
89a5('bum): spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden
89a6('bum): pa rnams myed do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab
89a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams
89a8('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
89b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur
89b2('bum): ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan rnams myed do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag
89b3('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
89b4('bum): spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/
89b5('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed
89b6('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshad myed pa rnams myed do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
89b7('bum): spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed
89b8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
90a1('bum): rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sdug ces
90a2('bum): bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
90a3('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad la myi spyod na shes rab
90a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa
90a5('bum): brgyad bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi
90a6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir
90a7('bum): zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa brgyad myed do/ /
90a8('bum): gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya ba 'am/
90b1('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
90b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
90b3('bum): gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa
90b4('bum): 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
90b5('bum): myed do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
90b6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
90b7('bum): pa dang / smon pa myed pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
90b8('bum): smon pa myed pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
91a1('bum): pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug
91a2('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed do/ /gal
91a3('bum): te mngon par shes pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
91a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon
91a5('bum): par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces
91a6('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/
91a7('bum): myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa myed do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya
91a8('bum): ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
91b1('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/
91b2('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/
91b3('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams myed do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag
91b4('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
91b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug
91b6('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
91b7('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo myed do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
91b8('bum): spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i
92a1('bum): stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba
92a2('bum): 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
92a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag ba 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta
92a4('bum): bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi
92a5('bum): rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
92a6('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug
92a7('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
92a8('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myi 'jigs pa rnams myed do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
92b1('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
92b2('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar
92b3('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
92b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i so so yang dag par
92b5('bum): rig pa rnams myed do/ /gal te byams pa chen po la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
92b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa
92b7('bum): chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
92b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur
93a1('bum): ba de lta bu'i byams pa chen po myed do/ /gal te snying rje chen po la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag
93a2('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
93a3('bum): do/ /gal te snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya
93a4('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug
93a5('bum): pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po myed do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs
93a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes
93a7('bum): bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya
93a8('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
93b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur
93b2('bum): ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa
93b3('bum): nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na
93b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams
93b5('bum): cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug
93b6('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thams cad shes pa nyid myed do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi
93b7('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
93b8('bum): gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag
94a1('bum): ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod
94a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug
94a3('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad
94a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes
94a5('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
94a6('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
94a7('bum): pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed do// //
94a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
94b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang
94b2('bum): yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
94b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
94b4('bum): te 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin

94b8('bum): no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
