100a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang
100b1('bum): yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
100b2('bum): la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong
100b3('bum): pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes
100b4('bum): bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
100b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su
100b6('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya
100b7('bum): ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus byas pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
100b8('bum): na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus ma byas pa stong
101a1('bum): pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong
101a2('bum): pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
101a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
101a4('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs
101a5('bum): su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so
101a6('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/
101a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
101a8('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes
101b1('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar
101b2('bum): yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir
101b3('bum): zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
101b4('bum): gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi dmyigs pa stong
101b5('bum): pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
101b6('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs
101b7('bum): su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid
101b8('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs
102a1('bum): pa gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa'i
102a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
102a3('bum): pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
102a4('bum): gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa nye bar
102a5('bum): gzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
102a6('bum): te yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
102a7('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul
102a8('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs
102b1('bum): pa gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so
102b2('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de
102b3('bum): ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
102b4('bum): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
102b5('bum): gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag
102b6('bum): rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
102b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
102b8('bum): pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i
103a1('bum): bden pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden
103a2('bum): pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
103a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya
103a4('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshad myed pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
103a5('bum): spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
103a6('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gang rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar
103a7('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
103a8('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
103b1('bum): 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
103b2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su ma rdzogs
103b3('bum): pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs
103b4('bum): so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
103b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma
103b6('bum): yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs
103b7('bum): kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya
103b8('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na
104a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs pa
104a2('bum): gang yin pa de myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
104a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po yongs su
104a4('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
104a5('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de
104a6('bum): ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so/ /zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
104a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid
104a8('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na
104b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su
104b2('bum): ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na
104b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
104b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams
104b5('bum): la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
104b6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par bstan to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
104b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
104b8('bum): tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du shes chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
105a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi
105a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig chags pa
105a3('bum): 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
105a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

105a8('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dri chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
105b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ro chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te reg chags pa
105b2('bum): 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu

105b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i
105b5('bum): rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
105b6('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
105b7('bum): pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
105b8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
106a1('bum): gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa
106a2('bum): 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
106a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
106a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
106a5('bum): tshe/ gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i
106a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
106a7('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags
106a8('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags
106b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na
106b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
106b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chu'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
106b4('bum): gal te mye'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rlung gi khams chags pa 'am ma
106b5('bum): chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nam mkha'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
106b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
106b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ma rig pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
106b8('bum): 'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
107a1('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mying dang gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
107a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skye mched drug chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab
107a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshor
107a4('bum): ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sred pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod
107a5('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te len pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
107a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te srid pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
107a7('bum): gal te skye ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rga shi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
107a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
107b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi
107b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
107b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam
107b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu
107b5('bum): phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
107b6('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
107b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
107b8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
108a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
108a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
108a3('bum): gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dus
108a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mtha' las 'das
108a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed
108a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid chags
108a7('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
108a8('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
108b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
108b2('bum): do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
108b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
108b4('bum): gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
108b5('bum): stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa
108b6('bum): 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
108b7('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na

109a1('bum): la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stobs rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes
109a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

109a4('bum): tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam
109a5('bum): gtan rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshad myed pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags
109a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
109a7('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
109a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
109b1('bum): pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
109b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

109b6('bum): pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am
109b7('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byams pa chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
109b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te snying rje chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
110a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

110a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs chags pa 'am ma

111a3('bum): ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /chu'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
111a4('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mye'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rlung gi khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /nam mkha'i
111a5('bum): khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /ma rig pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
111a6('bum): bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs
111a7('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /skye mched drug chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
111a8('bum): myed do/ /tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sred pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /len pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
111b1('bum): 'du shes pa myed do/ /srid pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /skye ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rga shi chags pa 'am ma chags pa
111b2('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
111b3('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
111b4('bum): shes pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
111b5('bum): myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid chags
111b6('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
111b7('bum): bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed
111b8('bum): do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /thog ma dang
112a1('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rang bzhin
112a2('bum): stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
112a3('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am
112a4('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
112a5('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed
112a6('bum): do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /stobs rnams chags pa
112a7('bum): 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am ma chags
112a8('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
112b1('bum): shes pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
112b2('bum): myed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
112b3('bum): myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
112b4('bum): bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /de bzhin
112b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig
112b6('bum): pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /byams pa chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po chags pa 'am ma chags
112b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags
112b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
113a1('bum): bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rang byang chub chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /bla na myed
113a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su myi 'grib/
113a3('bum): ma bstan kyang yongs su myi 'grib/ bstan kyang myi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang myi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ chos zab
113a4('bum): mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su myi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su myi 'grib/ bstan kyang myi 'phel ma bstan kyang myi 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
113a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mtsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i legs pa 'am ma legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba myed do/ /
113a6('bum): nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa myed do/ /nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba myed do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu
113a7('bum): ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba myed do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa myed do/ /legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba myed do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang khong
113a8('bum): khro bar 'gyur ba myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin ma bstan kyang de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
113b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang g.yeng bar myi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par
113b2('bum): bgyid cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar myi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
113b3('bum): po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so/ /tshor ba ma mchis so/ /'du shes ma mchis so/ /'du byed ma mchis so/ /
113b4('bum): rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni myig ma mchis so/ /rna ba ma mchis so/ /sna ma mchis so/ /lce ma mchis so/ /lus ma mchis so/ /yid ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni
113b5('bum): gzugs ma mchis so/ /sgra ma mchis so/ /dri ma mchis so/ /ro ma mchis so/ /reg ma mchis so/ /chos ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i rnam par
113b6('bum): shes pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la
113b7('bum): ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma
113b8('bum): mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /lce'i
114a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni sa'i
114a2('bum): khams ma mchis so/ /chu'i khams ma mchis so/ /mye'i khams ma mchis so/ /rlung gi khams ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so/ /
114a3('bum): nam mkha' la ni ma rig pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /mying dang gzugs ma mchis so/ /skye mched drug ma mchis so/ /reg pa ma mchis so/ /
114a4('bum): tshor ba ma mchis so/ /sred pa ma mchis so/ /len pa ma mchis so/ /srid pa ma mchis so/ /skye ba ma mchis so/ /rga shi ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma
114a5('bum): mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /
114a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /chen po
114a7('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /thog ma
114a8('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma
114b1('bum): mchis so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'
114b2('bum): la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so/ /dbang po rnams ma mchis so/ /stobs rnams ma mchis so/ /
114b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so/ /tshad myed pa
114b4('bum): rnams ma mchis so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so/ /
114b5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma mchis so/ /mngon par shes pa ma mchis so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis
114b6('bum): so/ /nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so/ /byams pa chen po ma mchis so/ /
114b7('bum): snying rje chen po ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /
114b8('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so/ /rang byang chub ma mchis so/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so// //
115a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni/ phyag bgyi
115a2('bum): bar 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/ 'bad par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can
115a3('bum): rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smyin par 'tshal zhing / yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'
115a4('bum): lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba'o/ /
115a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen
115a6('bum): po thob pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal
115a7('bum): ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
115a8('bum): rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ dpa' bo bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
115b1('bum): khams 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang
115b2('bum): pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis
115b3('bum): grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am 'gang bar myi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang sems
115b4('bum): can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal
115b5('bum): lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
115b6('bum): kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gyi khams la 'grib
115b7('bum): pa 'am 'gang bar myi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams kyi slad
115b8('bum): du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smyin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags shes mchi'o/ /
116a1('bum): de nas dge slong gcig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang myed la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po yang
116a2('bum): yod/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ phyir myi 'ong
116a3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang yod/ rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir
116a4('bum): 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba yang yod/ dgra bcom pa yang yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas
116a5('bum): dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
116a6('bum): 'tshal lo/ /snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
116a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par
116a8('bum): sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
116b1('bum): bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba
116b2('bum): dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras
116b3('bum): so/ /ke'u shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa brtsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la
116b4('bum): bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji
116b5('bum): skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
116b6('bum): bar gyur na/ de la myi 'am myi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang ji snyed du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
116b7('bum): kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung
116b8('bum): ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par sems dpa' ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar myi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal
117a1('bum): pa can du 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyu dang / rmyi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang myig yor dang / sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang /
117a2('bum): bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myi nus so/ /smras pa ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
117a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar myi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis
117a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myi nus so/ /smras pa
117a5('bum): ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar myi 'grub
117a6('bum): cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung
117a7('bum): ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myi nus so/ /smras pa ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
117a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar myi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang
117b1('bum): po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
117b2('bum): pas/ rmyi lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su
117b3('bum): shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma rlom
117b4('bum): sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems
117b5('bum): su myi byed/ sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom
117b6('bum): sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor
117b7('bum): kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ /gzugs rlom sems su myi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems
117b8('bum): su myi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su
118a1('bum): myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi

118a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ /tshor ba rlom sems su myi byed/ tshor bas rlom sems su myi byed/ tshor ba la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi
118a5('bum): lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems

122a8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe reg rlom sems su myi byed/ reg gis rlom sems su myi byed/ reg la rlom sems su myi
122b1('bum): byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su
122b2('bum): myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su
122b3('bum): myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor
122b4('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems
122b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos rlom sems su myi byed/ chos kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ chos la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi
122b6('bum): lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma
122b7('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis
122b8('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa
123a1('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
123a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig gi rnam par shes pa rlom sems su myi byed/ myig gi rnam par shes pas rlom sems su myi byed/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/
123a3('bum): de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom
123a4('bum): sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom
123a5('bum): sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa
123a6('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
123a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rlom sems su myi byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rlom sems su myi byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/
123a8('bum): de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/
123b1('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/
123b2('bum): sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom
123b3('bum): sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa'
123b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna'i rnam par shes pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sna'i rnam par shes pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sna'i rnam par shes
123b5('bum): pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/
123b6('bum): sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /
123b7('bum): de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems
123b8('bum): su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal
124a1('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rlom sems su myi byed/ lce'i rnam par shes pas rlom
124a2('bum): sems su myi byed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems
124a3('bum): su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus
124a4('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom
124a5('bum): sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi
124a6('bum): byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
124a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rlom sems su myi byed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pas rlom sems su myi byed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi
124a8('bum): lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la
124b1('bum): rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan

124b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rlom sems su myi byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pas rlom sems su myi byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam

125a1('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa rlom sems su myi byed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su myi byed/

126b8('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su myi byed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems

128a1('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su myi byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su myi byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom
128a2('bum): sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom
128a3('bum): sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan
128a4('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/
128a5('bum): myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub
128a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su myi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
128a7('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su myi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom
128a8('bum): sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su
128b1('bum): myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems
128b2('bum): su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems
128b3('bum): su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
128b4('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su myi byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su myi byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom sems su myi
128b5('bum): byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/
128b6('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan
128b7('bum): gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /
128b8('bum): de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
129a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sa'i khams rlom sems su myi byed/ sa'i khams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sa'i khams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom
129a2('bum): sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom

129a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chu'i khams rlom sems su myi byed/ chu'i khams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ chu'i khams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/

133b1('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ srid pa rlom sems
133b2('bum): su myi byed/ srid pas rlom sems su myi byed/ srid pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /
133b3('bum): de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la

133b5('bum): gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka
133b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ skye ba rlom sems su myi byed/ skye bas rlom sems su myi byed/ skye ba la rlom sems su myi
133b7('bum): byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/

134a7('bum): pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub
134a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sbyin pa'i pha

138b6('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/

138b8('bum): de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi
139a1('bum): byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /

139a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed

144a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/

144b2('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su
144b3('bum): myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor
144b4('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems
144b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ bsam gtan rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bsam
144b6('bum): gtan rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems
144b7('bum): su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su
144b8('bum): myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor
145a1('bum): gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems
145a2('bum): su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ tshad myed pa
145a3('bum): rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ tshad myed pa rnams la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom
145a4('bum): sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom
145a5('bum): sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /
145a6('bum): de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su
145a7('bum): myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i
145a8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rlom sems su myi byed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rlom
145b1('bum): sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom
145b2('bum): sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom
145b3('bum): sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/

145b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam
145b6('bum): par thar pa brgyad la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems
145b7('bum): su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed
145b8('bum): do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom

146a2('bum): ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rlom sems su myi byed/ mthar
146a3('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus rlom sems su myi byed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam

146a8('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas rlom sems su
146b1('bum): myi byed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/

147b5('bum): ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rlom sems su myi byed/ de bzhin
147b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcus rlom sems su myi byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su

148a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rlom sems su myi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis rlom sems su myi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom

148b5('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po rlom sems su myi byed/ byams pa chen pos rlom sems su myi byed/
148b6('bum): byams pa chen po la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom

149a2('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po rlom sems su
149a3('bum): myi byed/ snying rje chen pos rlom sems su myi byed/ snying rje chen po la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam

149a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rlom sems su myi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis rlom sems su myi

149b6('bum): su myi byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom
