192b8('bum): mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
193a1('bum): yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'
193a2('bum): yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' la 'go ba myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'go ba ma mchis
193a3('bum): pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
193a4('bum): su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i
193a5('bum): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar nam mkha'
193a6('bum): la tha snyad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/
193a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha'
193a8('bum): la ni gang yang brjod du myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmyigs su myed pa'i
193b1('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom
193b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmyigs su myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' rang bzhin dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
193b3('bum): yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
193b4('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam
193b5('bum): par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
193b6('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin
193b7('bum): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la myig gi nad 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / yan lag ma
193b8('bum): tshang bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan par myi 'gyur ro/ /rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su myi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni myi bde ba myi spongs pas dus byed par myi 'gyur ro/ /de'i
194a1('bum): slad bzhin lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /
194a2('bum): tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge dang / dge rgyas dang /
194a3('bum): che ba dang chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang
194a4('bum): na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bcwo lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu
194a5('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba tshad ma
194a6('bum): mchis pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de
194a7('bum): bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bcwo lnga dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
194a8('bum): kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba/ tshad myed pa grangs myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa mtshungs pa myed pa/ gzhal du myed pa dpag tu myed pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /
194b1('bum): rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su
194b2('bum): grol bar byed pa'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang myi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i
194b3('bum): rigs 'byin pa'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /mtshe ma'i
194b4('bum): lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /dga' ldan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'phrul dga'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /
194b5('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshangs chen gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched
194b6('bum): 'byin pa'o/ /snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /chung snang gi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye
194b7('bum): mched 'byin pa'o/ /dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /chung dge'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshad myed dge' ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /dge rgyas kyi lha'i skye
194b8('bum): ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /chung che'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha'i
195a1('bum): skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /myi che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /myi gdung ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /
195a2('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'og myin gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rnam shes mtha'
195a3('bum): yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /cung zad myed pa'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rgyun tu
195a4('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'byin pa'o/ /rang byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /yang dag par
195a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing
195a6('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod
195a7('bum): do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi
195a8('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang
195b1('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams
195b2('bum): yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha
195b3('bum): rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
195b4('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid
195b5('bum): yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yod do/ /gzugs myed
195b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yod do/ /dbang po lnga yod do/ /stobs lnga yod do/ /byang chub
195b7('bum): kyi yan lag bdun yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
195b8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /
196a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
196a2('bum): nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod
196a3('bum): do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yod do/
196a4('bum): bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
196a5('bum): pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
196a6('bum): bcu yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod do/ /byams pa chen po yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yod do/ /thams
196a7('bum): cad shes pa nyid yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher
196a8('bum): bstan te/ /de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i
196b1('bum): ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
196b2('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams
196b3('bum): yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge
196b4('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i
196b5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
196b6('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha
196b7('bum): rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub
196b8('bum): sems dpa' rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /de bas na de la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o/ /pha rol tu
197a1('bum): phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am dor ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
197a2('bum): 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba 'am yongs su gzung ba 'am dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu myed do/ /rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni
197a3('bum): dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba 'am 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am zag pa myed pa 'am/ 'dus byas pa 'am 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmyigs su myed de/
197a4('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmyigs su myed do/ /rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang 'go ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go
197a5('bum): bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmyigs su myed de/ rab 'byor de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba myed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
197a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes pa yang myi byed la de ltar myi rtog cing de ltar myi dmyigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang myi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes
197a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/ /de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
197a8('bum): dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / sangs
197b1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /rab 'byord shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa 'am rnam par ston pa 'am yongs su
197b2('bum): ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am 'byin par byed pa 'am skye bar byed pa 'am 'gog par byed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am
197b3('bum): 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung bar byed pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/
197b4('bum): gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin// //
197b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
197b6('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
197b7('bum): phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/
197b8('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ don
198a1('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ mtha'
198a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
198a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ myi
198a4('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo
198a5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
198a6('bum): rkang pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dbang po rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgrub pa ma yin/
198a7('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams sgrub pa ma yin/
198a8('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/
198b1('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sgrub pa
198b2('bum): ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/
198b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/
198b4('bum): byams pa chen po sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ snying rje chen po sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs
198b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dgra bcom
198b6('bum): pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa
198b7('bum): ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
198b8('bum): pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa de ni de bzhin du gnas
199a1('bum): pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par thugs su chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud
199a2('bum): nas kyang gsung ngo / /ston to rjod do/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung
199a3('bum): ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / man dA ra ba chen pos 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /
199a4('bum): kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba myed pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bar mthong
199a5('bum): ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin
199a6('bum): gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/ myi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
199a7('bum): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ myi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar myi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/
199a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
199b1('bum): phyin pas stong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi
199b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /phyi stong
199b3('bum): pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid
199b4('bum): kyis stong ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
199b5('bum): kyis stong ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dor
199b6('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /
199b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
199b8('bum): kyis stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
200a1('bum): rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
200a2('bum): rnams kyis stong ngo / /dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo / /stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo / /
200a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /bsam gtan rnams
200a4('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo / /tshad myed pa rnams tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong
200a5('bum): ngo / /rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rnam
200a6('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas stong ngo / /mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes
200a7('bum): pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs
200a8('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ngo / /myi 'jigs pa rnams myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /byams pa chen po
200b1('bum): byams pa chen pos stong ngo / /snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun
200b2('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /dgra bcom pa nyid
200b3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
200b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin
200b5('bum): gyis stong pa'o/ /de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par
200b6('bum): r dzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis chos kyi 'khor lo yang skor la chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am myi 'khor ba 'am rab tu
200b7('bum): 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba 'am/ yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar
200b8('bum): bgyi ba 'am myi 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmyigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o/ /de
201a1('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am myi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am myi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags
201a2('bum): so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am myi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang rab tu bstan pa dang bsgrags pa dang rab tu 'god
201a3('bum): pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang smos pa dang gsal bar bgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /
201a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ngo / /gang sus kyang ma bstan kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ /gang sus kyang mngon
201a5('bum): du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
201a6('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu dgu'o/ / // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
201a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
201a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
201b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
201b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thub pa myed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
201b3('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mying dang lus myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
201b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba myed pa'i phyir ro/ /
201b5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang /
201b6('bum): rnam par dpyod pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
201b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
201b8('bum): ni mchi ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
202a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni myi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
202a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
202a3('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang /
202a4('bum): 'gag pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
202a5('bum): pa/ byed pa po dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
202a6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
202a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha
202a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmyi
202b1('bum): lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmyi lam gyi mthong ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202b2('bum): phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang sgrar brjod pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
202b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni myig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mye long gi bzhin dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
202b4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smyig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
202b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /
202b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun
202b7('bum): pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
202b8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i
203a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmyigs su ma mchis
203a2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa
203a3('bum): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
203a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
203a5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni myi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
203a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag
203a7('bum): pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
203a8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
203b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed cing dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i
203b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe
203b3('bum): sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
203b4('bum): 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ myi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
203b5('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
203b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can myed pa'i phyir ro/ /
203b7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas
203b8('bum): ldang ba myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su myi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
204a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha myi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
204a2('bum): thams cad 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos
204a3('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
204a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
204a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
204a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni myi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
204a7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
204a8('bum): chos thams cad tshor bar sbyor ba myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
204b1('bum): chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
204b2('bum): chos thams cad dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
204b3('bum): chos thams cad mngon par grub pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi
204b4('bum): chos dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmyigs su
204b5('bum): myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmyigs su
204b6('bum): myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
204b7('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong
204b8('bum): pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
205a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
205a2('bum): stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
205a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
205a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
205a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba
205a6('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
205a7('bum): pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
205a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
205b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
205b2('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
205b3('bum): phyin pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po myed pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
205b4('bum): 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
205b5('bum): ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
205b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
205b7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang myi dge ba'i chos dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
205b8('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
206a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
206a2('bum): stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin
206a3('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
206a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
206a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
206a6('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa'i dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa myed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
206a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
206a8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
206b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
206b2('bum): phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang ser sna dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
206b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ngan pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
206b4('bum): phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang bzod pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
206b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang brtson 'grus dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
206b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
206b7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang 'chal pa'i shes rab dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
206b8('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
207a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
207a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags so myed pa dang / thogs pa myed pa'i phyir ro/ /
207a3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /
207a4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
207a5('bum): kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
207a6('bum): stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
207a7('bum): chos thams cad dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
207a8('bum): chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu'o// //
207b1('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
207b2('bum): sems can gang gi rna lam du de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /
207b3('bum): gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klag pa dang kun chub par bya bar byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed
207b4('bum): pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur ba de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
207b5('bum): sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so yongs su zhus so/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur zhing thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /
207b6('bum): klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ /brtson
207b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do snyam pa dang / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
207b8('bum): to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur zhing thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub
208a1('bum): par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
208a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
208a3('bum): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos kyang mos par bgyi bar myi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
208a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems dpa' dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
208a5('bum): de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
208a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/
208a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar
208a8('bum): spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/
208b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mtha' las
208b2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ chos thams
208b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/
208b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ji ltar bsgom
208b5('bum): par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dbang po rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ stobs rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags
208b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ tshad myed pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/
208b7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rnam par thar
208b8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar
209a1('bum): bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ sangs
209a2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus yongs su ma dris so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i
209a3('bum): bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par myi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che/
209a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
209a5('bum): pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
209a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
209a7('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
209a8('bum): rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang /
209b1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon
209b2('bum): par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
209b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos par myi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
209b4('bum): phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/
209b5('bum): de de bzhin no/ /ke'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas
209b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do/ /ke'u shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas
209b7('bum): par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos
209b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
210a1('bum): brtson par bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
210a2('bum): bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
210a3('bum): bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /
210a4('bum): sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
210a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha
210a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /khams gsum gyi phul
210a7('bum): du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /bdud pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
210a8('bum): brtson par bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom
210b1('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi
210b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
210b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
210b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes
210b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha
210b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi
210b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
210b8('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtson
211a1('bum): par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa
211a2('bum): nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma
211a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
211a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
211a5('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson
211a6('bum): par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs
211a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
211a8('bum): tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
211b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na
211b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
211b3('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson par bgyid pa
211b4('bum): lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags
211b5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
211b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
211b7('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
211b8('bum): 'jug pa dgu la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
212a1('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtson
212a2('bum): par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs
212a3('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
212a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na
212a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la brtson
212a6('bum): par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems dpa' legs
212a7('bum): so legs so/ /ke'u shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis byung ngo // //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi
212a8('bum): pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/
212b1('bum): gzugs la brtson par byed do/ /tshor ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe tshor ba la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /'du shes la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'du shes la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/
212b2('bum): 'du shes la brtson par byed do/ /'du byed la myi gnas te gang gi tshe/ 'du byed la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par shes pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la
212b3('bum): myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /myig la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe myig la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ myig la brtson par byed do/ /rna ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rna ba la myi gnas pa
212b4('bum): de'i tshe/ rna ba la brtson par byed do/ /sna la myi gnas te gang gi tshe sna la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sna la brtson par byed do/ /lce la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe lce la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ lce la brtson par byed do/ /
212b5('bum): lus la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe lus la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ lus la brtson par byed do/ /yid la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid la brtson par byed do/ /gzugs la myi
212b6('bum): gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed do/ /sgra la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sgra la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sgra la brtson par byed do/ /dri la myi gnas te/
212b7('bum): gang gi tshe dri la myi gnas pa de'i tshe dri la brtson par byed do/ /ro la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe ro la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ ro la brtson par byed do/ /reg la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe reg la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/
212b8('bum): reg la brtson par byed do/ /chos la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la brtson par byed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe myig gi rnam par shes pa
213a1('bum): la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la
213a2('bum): brtson par byed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sna'i rnam par shes pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa la myi gnas te/
213a3('bum): gang gi tshe lce'i rnam par shes pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/
213a4('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /myig gi
213a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
213a6('bum): la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do/ /
213a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe lus kyi 'dus te
213a8('bum): reg pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la
213b1('bum): brtson par byed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson
213b2('bum): par byed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson par
213b3('bum): byed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /
213b4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /
213b5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /
213b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /
213b7('bum): sa'i khams la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sa'i khams la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa'i khams la brtson par byed do/ /chu'i khams la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chu'i khams la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chu'i khams
213b8('bum): la brtson par byed do/ /mye'i khams la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mye'i khams la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mye'i khams la brtson par byed do/ /rlung gi khams la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rlung gi khams la myi gnas
214a1('bum): pa de'i tshe/ rlung gi khams la brtson par byed do/ /nam mkha'i khams la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe nam mkha'i khams la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ nam mkha'i khams la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i
214a2('bum): khams la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed do/ /ma rig pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe ma rig pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/
214a3('bum): ma rig pa la brtson par byed do/ /'du byed la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'du byed la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par shes pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la myi gnas pa de'i
214a4('bum): tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /mying dang gzugs la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mying dang gzugs la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mying dang gzugs la brtson par byed do/ /skye mched drug la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe skye
214a5('bum): mched drug la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ skye mched drug la brtson par byed do/ /reg pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe reg pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ reg pa la brtson par byed do/ /tshor ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe tshor ba la

214a7('bum): len pa la brtson par byed do/ /srid pa la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe srid pa la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ srid pa la brtson par byed do/ /skye ba la myi gnas te/ gang gi tshe skye ba la myi gnas pa de'i tshe/ skye ba la brtson par

219a5('bum): ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs so/ /gang la
219a6('bum): gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang po rnams myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i stobs myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par
219a7('bum): bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs so/ /
219a8('bum): gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs so/ /
219b1('bum): gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi
219b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa brgyad myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i
219b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas
219b4('bum): par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas
219b5('bum): par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi dmyigs so/ /
219b6('bum): gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi dmyigs so/ /
219b7('bum): gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i byams pa chen po myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po myi dmyigs so/ /
219b8('bum): gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
220a1('bum): bu myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i phyir myi
220a2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i
220a3('bum): rang byang chub myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam
220a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la myi sbyor myi 'byed de gang gi tshe
220a5('bum): gzugs la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed do/ /tshor ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed de gang gi tshe tshor ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /'du shes la myi sbyor myi
220a6('bum): 'byed de gang gi tshe 'du shes la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ 'du shes la brtson par byed do/ /'du byed la myi sbyor myi 'byed de gang gi tshe 'du byed la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed la brtson par byed do/ /
