223b8('bum): sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson par byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/
224a1('bum): gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi sbyor myi
224a2('bum): 'byed de/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /bsam gtan rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe bsam
224a3('bum): gtan rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams la brtson par byed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe tshad myed pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ tshad
224a4('bum): myed pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i
224a5('bum): tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par thar pa brgyad la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam
224a6('bum): par thar pa brgyad la brtson par byed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa
224a7('bum): de'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par
224a8('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la brtson par byed do/ /mngon par
224b1('bum): shes pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe ting nge
224b2('bum): 'dzin rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtson par byed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
224b3('bum): la brtson par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtson par byed do/ /
224b4('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe myi 'jigs pa bzhi la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtson par byed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/
224b5('bum): gang gi tshe so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson par byed do/ /byams pa chen po la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byams pa chen po la myi
224b6('bum): sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byams pa chen po la brtson par byed do/ /snying rje chen po la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe snying rje chen po la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ snying rje chen po la brtson par byed do/ /sangs rgyas
224b7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la brtson par byed do/ /
224b8('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe thams cad shes pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi sbyor myi
225a1('bum): 'byed de/ gang gi tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam
225a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco lnga pa/
225a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
225a4('bum): so/ /gzugs dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs
225a5('bum): so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
225a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes
225a7('bum): pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig sngon gyi mthar
225a8('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /myig phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
225b1('bum): so/ /rna ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
225b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
225b3('bum): lus phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid dbus
225b4('bum): su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab
225b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgra sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dri sngon
225b6('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ro sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ro phyi ma'i mthar
225b7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /ro dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ reg sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
225b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig gi rnam par shes pa sngon gyi
226a1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i rnam par
226a2('bum): shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna'i
226a3('bum): rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce'i rnam
226a4('bum): par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
226a5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
226a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
226a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
226a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
226b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
226b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
226b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
226b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
226b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
226b6('bum): kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
226b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar
226b8('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
227a1('bum): tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
227a2('bum): ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i
227a3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar
227a4('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
227a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ sa'i khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chu'i
227a6('bum): khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mye'i khams sngon gyi mthar myi
227a7('bum): dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rlung gi khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi
227a8('bum): khams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams phyi ma'i
227b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi
227b2('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ma rig pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
227b3('bum): so/ /ma rig pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
227b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
227b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mying dang gzugs sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes
227b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ skye mched drug sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi
227b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
227b8('bum): tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sred pa sngon gyi mthar myi
228a1('bum): dmyigs so/ /sred pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ len pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /len pa phyi ma'i mthar
228a2('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /len pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ srid pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa dbus su myi
228a3('bum): dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ skye ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
228a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rga shi sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha
228a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
228a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs
228a7('bum): so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol
228a8('bum): tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i
228b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
228b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
228b3('bum): phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
228b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
228b5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sngon
228b6('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi
228b7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid sngon
228b8('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sngon
229a1('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus
229a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
229a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
229a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
229a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
229a6('bum): stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed
229a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin
229a8('bum): stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
229b1('bum): so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i
229b2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi
229b3('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
229b4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
229b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
229b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
229b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
229b8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
230a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
230a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab
230a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
230a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dbus su myi dmyigs
230a5('bum): so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
230a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden
230a7('bum): pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
230a8('bum): bsam gtan rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
230b1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sngon gyi mthar
230b2('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
230b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
230b4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
230b5('bum): dgu dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
230b6('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
230b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
230b8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
231a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab
231a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
231a3('bum): bcu dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jig pa bzhi sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jig pa bzhi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi dbus
231a4('bum): su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so
231a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byams pa chen po phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byams pa
231a6('bum): chen po dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
231a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi
231a8('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi
231b1('bum): dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
231b2('bum): so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i
231b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
231b4('bum): pa ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab
231b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
231b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i de
231b7('bum): bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir
231b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i
232a1('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
232a2('bum): pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg gi de bzhin nyid
232a3('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/
232a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/
232a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/
232a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab
232a7('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin
232a8('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus
232b1('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu
232b2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/
232b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
232b4('bum): kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
232b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
232b6('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232b7('bum): phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab
232b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa'i de bzhin
233a1('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i
233a2('bum): de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched
233a3('bum): drug gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba'i
233a4('bum): de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa'i de bzhin nyid zab
233a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes
233a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/
233a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
233a8('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
233b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab
233b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab
233b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab
233b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
233b5('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas
233b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
233b7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
233b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab
234a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
234a2('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i
234a3('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid
234a4('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i
234a5('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
234a6('bum): bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
234a7('bum): phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
234a8('bum): pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid
234b1('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i
234b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/
234b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/
234b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de
234b5('bum): bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang
234b6('bum): dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i
234b7('bum): bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/
234b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad
235a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
235a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
235a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/
235a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gting
235a5('bum): dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna gting
235a6('bum): dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu
235a7('bum): lus gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /
235a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting
235b1('bum): dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting
235b2('bum): dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
235b3('bum): phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes
235b4('bum): pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag
235b5('bum): dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/
235b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi
235b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
235b8('bum): gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag
236a1('bum): dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa
236a2('bum): ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes
236a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i
236a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/
236a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /
236a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/
236a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams gting
236a8('bum): dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /
236b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab
236b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/
236b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs gting
236b4('bum): dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i
236b5('bum): bu reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /
236b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
236b7('bum): gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes
236b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
237a1('bum): pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
237a2('bum): pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
237a3('bum): gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting
237a4('bum): dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid gting dpag
237a5('bum): dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu
237a6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
237a7('bum): phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag
237a8('bum): dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /
237b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes
237b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa
237b3('bum): nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /
237b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/
237b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed
237b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting
237b7('bum): dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gting dpag
237b8('bum): dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /
238a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
238a2('bum): phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/
238a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra
238a4('bum): dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
238a5('bum): tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad myed pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
238a6('bum): pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting
238a7('bum): dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
238a8('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes
238b1('bum): pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i
238b2('bum): bu gzungs kyi sgo gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
238b3('bum): pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa bzhi gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag
238b4('bum): dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs
238b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab
238b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams
238b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan
238b8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /
239a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes
239a2('bum): pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
239a3('bum): tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus
239a4('bum): tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
239a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa
239a6('bum): ti'i bu ro tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos tshad myed pa'i phyir/
239a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i
239a8('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed
239b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par
239b2('bum): shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna
239b3('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i
239b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid
239b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad
239b6('bum): myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad
239b7('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu
239b8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes
240a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
240a2('bum): pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /
240a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /
240a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par
240a5('bum): shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug
240a6('bum): tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab
240a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed
240a8('bum): do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i
240b1('bum): bu rga shi tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul
240b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /
240b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab
240b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/
240b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/
240b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i
240b7('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong
240b8('bum): pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa
241a1('bum): ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
241a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab
241a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/
241a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed
241a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
241a6('bum): pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag
241a7('bum): par spong ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po
241a8('bum): tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag tshad
241b1('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu
241b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad
241b3('bum): myed pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa
241b4('bum): ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab
241b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /
241b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /

241b8('bum): phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa bzhi tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad myed pa'i phyir/
242a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
242a2('bum): bcwo brgyad tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu
242a3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
242a4('bum): tshad myed do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
242a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
242a6('bum): tshe/ gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
242a7('bum): 'du shes zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par
242a8('bum): shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba zab ces
242b1('bum): bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

243a7('bum): bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams zab ces

243b1('bum): bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams zab ces bya

243b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
243b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

249a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag
249a7('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
249a8('bum): gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes
249b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag
249b2('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
249b3('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
249b4('bum): ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
249b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
249b6('bum): kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
249b7('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mye'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab
249b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams gting dpag
250a1('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
250a2('bum): spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
250a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
250a4('bum): myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa gting dpag
250a5('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa gting dpag
250a6('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa gting
250a7('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi
250a8('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
250b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting
250b2('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
250b3('bum): gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod
250b4('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes
250b5('bum): bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid
250b6('bum): stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chen po stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
250b7('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi
250b8('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mtha' las
251a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi
251a2('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid
251a3('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
251a4('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi
251a5('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong
251a6('bum): pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
251a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams
251a8('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
251b1('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
251b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya
251b3('bum): bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams gting
251b4('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed
251b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
251b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
251b7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/
251b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag
252a1('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
252a2('bum): gal te myi 'jigs pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/
252a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
252a4('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
252a5('bum): spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya
252a6('bum): bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i gting dpag dka'
252a7('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no/ /'du shes kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin no/ /'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin no/ /rnam par shes
252a8('bum): pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /myig gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig ma yin no/ /rna ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i
252b1('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin no/ /sna'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sna ma yin no/ /lce'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lce ma yin no/ /lus kyi gting dpag
252b2('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lus ma yin no/ /yid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ yid ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /sgra'i gting dpag
252b3('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sgra ma yin no/ /dri'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dri ma yin no/ /ro'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ ro ma yin no/ /reg gi gting dpag dka' ba gang
252b4('bum): yin pa de ni/ reg ma yin no/ /chos kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ chos ma yin no/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa
